tool.name: Generate Shapes
tool.description: The tool allows one to generate point, line or polygon shapes from a table with the following attribute fields:<br/><br/>- identifier<br/>- x coordinate<br/>- y coordinate<br/>- optional: z coordinate (this will create a 3D shapefile)<br/><br/>The table must be sorted in vertex order.<br/><br/>The identifier has different meanings:<br/><br/>* Point Shapes: The identifier is arbitrary<br/><br/>* Line Shapes: The identifier is unique for each line<br/><br/>* Polygon Shapes: The identifier is unique for each polygon; the first polygon vertex may but must not be duplicated in order to close the polygon<br/><br/>
